lines.text: Is that a stake in your pocket, or are you happy to see me?
Ha, ha! It's a stake! Die, bitch!
[Kyle then runs through Kristina with the stake]
I can make you feel... like you've never felt before!
[She presses up against him, and his pant legs shoot up]
I hate to break the news to ya, but I think you're a vampire!
I hate it when that happens.

[Kyle stabs Russell, who's now a vampire, with a umbrella point. Russell gasps]
And I lent you my rollerskates!
Aw, gee, Russell, I feel bad enough already!
